# chaos

𒅖 kuš₇ chaos “devastation”

𒅃 kiši₁₁ chaos : "the Netherworld" Akk. kurnugi 𒅃 IDIM&IDIM.BUR 𒅂 ʷIDIM "wild" 𒁁 ᵇIDIM ⇔ bad

𒆨 kiši "chaos" turmoil #dih₃ #sahmaštu

𓐍 𓀒 𓂋 "fall" cadere / cascare @ Latin =>

Dual of Maat

𓁣 | (divinity) Seth (god) | ⇔ Chaos
𓇋 𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓅪 | disorder | as¬order < •bisorder бесorder ☑
𓇋 𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓅪 |Isfet | #jsft Josephat ill-fate ? "disorder"
𓇋 𓊃 𓆑 𓏏 𓅪 |Isfet | #jzft #ı͗zf.t ⇔ intifada اِنْتِفَاضَة intifāḍa ⇔ اِنْتِفَاض intifāḍ, “shaking”
𓇋 𓊃 𓆑 𓏏 𓅪 |Isfet | Injustice, Violence, Chaos ⇔ Seth 𓊃 𓆑 𓏏 Dual of Maat
